subject: Investing
title: Screening for Dividend Stocks
description: Learn Screening for Dividend Stocks in one minute.

hook.text: There are over 3,000 dividend-paying US stocks. A simple five-filter screen narrows it to under 50 quality picks.

buildup.text: Start with yield above 2%, payout ratio below 60%, five-year dividend growth, and positive free cash flow.

discovery.text: Add a debt-to-equity filter below 1.0 to ensure the balance sheet can support the dividend through downturns.

twist.text: Screens are starting points, not endpoints. Always read the latest earnings call to check for warning signs.

climax.text: Free screeners on sites like Finviz, Seeking Alpha, and your broker can run these filters in seconds.

punchline.text: Screens shrink thousands of stocks to a short list. Then the real research begins.
